umbTextpage.bodyText:
ICP filing operation analysis

Final renewal date: July 2017

Filing type

Initial filing
Original filing in Blue Cloud: Add a website, filing changes, filing sign-off
Original filing not in Blue Cloud: newly added website, newly added access

Filing of specific operations

1. Filing requirements for each province
Before registering, first know your own local administration’s filing requirements. This will make your audit by the local administration go smoothly.
Download all provincial administration special requirements

2. Filing of specific operations
2.1 Sign into account
Sign in to https://icp.cloud.21vianet.com, download account number and click Sign in.


2.2 Cancel filing
If you have already registered and need to delete information, you can cancel filing operations. Go to the home page and select “cancel filing.”

To skip to the page, select the corresponding cancelation page

After confirming cancellation, fill in the relevant information and “save”

Return to the homepage of the “Cancel filing information” tab to submit the record.


2.3 Filing actions after submitting filing information

  1. After submitting filing, we will conduct an audit within 2 business days and will let you know by mail or phone if there are any problems. Please make sure your phone is available and check your mail.
  2. After filing is completed, the administration will notify the host’s responsible person by mail and SMS.
    Attached: the estimated audit period of some provincial administrations. (Note: the audit period is ultimately up to the administration)
    3 Weeks：Gansu, Yunnan
    2 Weeks: Beijing, Zhejiang, Hubei, Tianjin, Jiangxi, Guangxi, Hebei, Heilongjiang, Inner Mongolia
    1 Week: Guangdong, Jiangsu, Sichuan, Henan, Shanxi, Anhui, Fujian, Guizhou, Liaoning, Hainan, Hunan, Xinjiang, Shanxi, Ningxia, Chongqing
    3 Days: Shanghai
  3. After the filing information is submitted: you can check on the progress of filing through the filing module.


4. If the administrative audit is not passed, we will call and mail you to inform you of the reason and assist you in submitting additional information. Please ensure your phone is available and check your mail.
umbTextpage.pageTitle: ICP Filing Cancellation ICP Filing Operating Procedure Analysis - Azure Cloud Computing
umbTextpage.metaKeywords: ICP Filing Cancellation ICP Filing Operating Procedure Analysis
umbTextpage.metaDescription: According to the Chinese Ministry of Industry and Information Technology’s “The Regulation on Internet Information Services” and “Measures for the Archival Administration of Non-operational Internet Information Services,” anyone who runs a website within China’s boundaries (based on domain name resolution) must carry out ICP filing. Moreover, according to the Communications Authority, you cannot go online if your domain name is not registered. All registered domain names must also resolve to a registered IP.
